title: Stoopid picture..
content:
Ok, first I thought I could try drawing a comic I have planned sometimes, a comic about daily un-normal life of some Keeners (imagination characters). Well, I noticed I don't have the required skills at all, so I tried to draw something other.
It's amazing how much time drawing can take. If I remember correct I worked about two hours doing this picture. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] Anyways, as I said already I don't have skills at all. I drew that picture in Paint and added the texts in Paint Shop Pro. In paint I used 2x2 "brush" and you can see it..
Tell your commments..

[img]http://keengrid.net/keenrush/conversation.png[/img]

PS. That non-green person in the picture is somewhat like me. Those are supposed to be eyeglasses, but they probably look like big eyes..
As well, notice that I wouldn't be like that on real life. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Maybe I shouldn't post this.. This is embarrassing.. Well, here it goes anyways..You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Stoopid picture..
content:
Heh heh. That's funny. Believe it or not, That's how I drew last september.
But I don't understand who your comic would be about. Like using people on the forum, or would you make them up?

[quote]Quote:[hr]It's amazing how much time drawing can take. If I remember correct I worked about two hours doing this picture.[hr][/quote]
Oh man! You have no idea. I can spend up to an hour and a half just doing the pencil work on one character if I don't pay attention. And that doesn't include coloring.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] -----------------------
"The Adventures of Commander Keen" issue #1: [img]http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/5377/newikeen3ib.png[/img]

title: hehe!
content: So we get our first peek at KeenRush's social life!  ;-)  Do you really have orange-y hair?  Or is it more brown?

title: Class.
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] I like. More!Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

title: Re: Class.
content:
KR: And this is LL getting clobbered by a Fleex.

LL: OMG Its teh 1337 drawing 5kills! I look beautiful!

KR: Really? I just photoshopped a cowpat into the picture.A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Class.
content:
Mmmh.. cowpat.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img]

Anyways, cheers! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Then, answerin' the questions:

"But I don't understand who your comic would be about. Like using people on the forum, or would you make them up?"
IIRC I said they would be imagination characters, meaning I'd made them up. Naturally they could have some charasteristics of some members. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] But anyways, I was thinking about making the main characters two university students that live in the same flat. They're both Keeners, lame, and so on. They'd have allkinds of crazy stuff happening to them.

"Do you really have orange-y hair? Or is it more brown?"
No, it isn't orangey.. I selected that colour because it looked the best. One can't probably make the hair just right shade of colour by using only one colour. Yeah, I guess more brown -- but not brown. Well, it's hard to explain.. And nobody cares. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

And Spleen; I'll draw more later. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img] Although not probably for a while.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Class.
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]They'd have allkinds of crazy stuff happening to them.[hr][/quote]
Hurray.

Not bad for a Paint drawing. My artwork improved a fair bit when I bought a tablet and practised in Photoshop. (In case you hadn't guessed, drawing in Paint does not make your art look good.)[url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url]
[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Class.
content: Well, yeah. The program's "fine" but the problem is the actual drawing. I just can't draw with a mouse. To get even one small part done I need to draw and Undo and draw and Undo at least ten times until the line's somewhat not all-wrong. But well, I'm not going to learn to draw.. As well, I don't like drawing on paper, since I can't burn those easily. I should probably get one of those tables but they'd probably cost thousands of dollars.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Class.
content:
I don't know much about drawing with a mouse. I know how to use most of the tools but I'm not very good at drawing my own original art in pixel. I can rip graphics fine (don't mean to brag though) but I'm just not very good at drawing my own original art in pixel. I drew my own Keen sprite though, it didn't look perfect but it was certainly cute (no meaning to brag though), and I also drew Keen's head by memory and it looked almost exactly the same as the real head of Keen (not meaning to brag though) and the only problem was it's chin. Although I draw much better on paper (not meaning to brag though).-------------------
A proud member of the beta testing society

title: hehe
content: Wow, Harvey, that was a long post, for you--you're improving in leaps and bounds!  I think you should consider making a mod for Keen1.  :-)  I'm interested in your spritework!

title: Re: Stoopid picture..
content: [quote]Quote:[hr]Maybe I shouldn't post this.. This is embarrassing.. Well, here it goes anyways..[hr][/quote]lol, that sounds funny [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Have you thought about drawing in something like Flash? It seems to be much easier to make professional-looking graphics in Flash. Not to mention being easier to copy elements of the picture from one comic to the next...

content:

title: Re: ...
content:
Wait, why is this in "other keen stuff?"
It doesn't have much to do with keen...

Anyway, nice picture, even for paint.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]

title: Re: ...
content:
Thanks. Oh, I thought Other Keen Stuff was for everything that has something Keen related. This features a garg (Ok, a bit humanized version of garg though..) and info about my plan about some stupid comic.

"Have you thought about drawing in something like Flash?"
Nope, haven't thought of that. Probably won't, seems too complicated for me..

"KeenRush--are you going to make more comics, or was this just a one-shot?"
Yes. But this wasn't part of those comics, this was just some gargart. I'll try to draw those comics sometime, and make more gargart -- but hopefully much better than this.

About this comic; that "allkinds of crazy stuff" I mentioned is naturally Commander Keen related.. Keen stuff, jokes, characters etc..

"Just one question: Would you like an entire mod or just a Keen sprite?"
Full mod! Good luck Harvey. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: ...
content: Ok, its a garg. I wasn't sure cause it has arms.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v609/genius314/picturekeen.bmp[/img]
